description:
You’ll love my place because of the cleanliness & location. Perfect for business travelers with wifi, cable TV, computer desk & printer. 15 mins to Manhattan; 8 mins to Barclay's. Close to all Brooklyn attractions and all major transportation lines.

Perfect for business travelers and first timers to NYC.

Wifi, cable TV, fully equipped kitchen, linens and towels, air conditioning

Approximately 2x a week.

Parking is on the street. Walking distance to major trains, subways & buses. Taxis & Uber Cars are in adundance.
name: Cozy, Clean "Like Home" Full 1 Bdrm
review: Had a great stay in NYC.  Tiffany was a good host.  The apartment was comfortable and located close to restaurants and the train station.
